derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'relating to or in the style of comedy'): from Latin comicus (see comic) + -al

entry.def: If you describe something as comical, you mean that it makes you want to laugh because it seems funny or silly.

example.tran: 事态出现了有趣的转折。
